home_top_title: Panda Records – the sound that changes everything
home_top_text: Beat production, vocal recording, mixing, mastering, and audio recording for ads and audiobooks. Everything that sounds can sound even better with Panda Records.
home_about_text: We are a team of professionals in love with sound. Our studio brings together talented engineers, and musicians who turn ideas into masterpieces.
not_support_video: Your browser does not support the video tag.
home_testimonials_block1_text: Panda Records - modern equipment, good recording quality, friendly staff.
home_testimonials_block2_text: I am very pleased with the recording! The sound is clear, without noise, and the mix sounds professional.
home_testimonials_block3_text: The studio team is very attentive to details. They helped to adapt the sound to my style!
about_us_title: Let us tell you more about us and our passion
about_us_title_top_text: Welcome to Panda Records, where we invite inspiration by creating the conditions for the best sound.
about_us_founder_text1: Hello! My name is Roman, and I am a passionate sound engineer at our studio. I’ve been creating music for over five years, but my love for it has been with me my entire life. Throughout my career, I’ve had the privilege of working regularly with talented artists such as Milan, Field, and Your Bunny Writes.
about_us_founder_text2: My journey began as a self-taught musician, fueled by curiosity and determination. In my third year, I decided to deepen my knowledge by studying in Kyiv with some of the best professionals in the industry. That experience helped me refine my skills and broaden my creative vision. Now based in Lviv, I dedicate myself to helping artists bring their musical ideas to life.
about_us_history_block1: I love music and I want to inspire and help musicians reach their true potential. I love music and I want to inspire
about_us_history_block2_section1: I wanted to create a place where musicians could feel comfortable, experiment, and develop their sound without limitations.
about_us_history_block2_section2: The idea of opening a studio came from my passion for music and my desire to develop it in Ukraine.
about_us_history_block3: The ongoing war in Ukraine has created a difficult environment for many, and we are pleased to offer a recording studio that allows Ukrainian musicians to share their work with the world while making a positive impact.
about_us_history_block4_section1: At first, there was basic equipment and a small room where I spent countless hours learning.
about_us_history_block4_section2: As I gained experience, the studio slowly took shape. It was a process of trial and error, but each step brought me closer to realizing the vision.
about_us_history_block5: We create the space for your creativity — from concept to finished track. We bring your ideas to life at the highest level. Regardless of the genre or scale of the project.
about_us_teacher_text1: Hello! My name is Anton, and I am a guitarist with over 10 years of experience. My musical journey spans acoustic, electric, and bass guitars. I firmly believe that music is a universal language that brings people together, and I would be delighted to help you master it.
about_us_teacher_text2: Over the years, I’ve been part of various musical projects. Yet, my greatest joy comes from seeing my students achieve their goals. My teaching approach combines technique, creativity, and simplicity. Together, we’ll develop your playing style and find a method that suits you best. Let’s embark on your unique musical journey and create something truly special.
portfolio_banner1_text: 'When you are happy, you enjoy the music. When you are hurt, you understand the lyrics.' – Victor Hugo
services_lessons_guitar_text: You will learn proper techniques, develop your musical ear, master your favorite pieces, and find inspiration to create your own music. Lessons are not just classes - they are a journey toward your musical dream.
services_lessons_engineering_text: Discover the secrets of professional audio production with personalized sound engineering lessons. Learn to mix, master, and design sound like a pro, using industry-standard tools and techniques.

policy_block1_text1: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information. By using our services, you agree to the practices outlined in this policy.
policy_block2_text1: We collect the following types of information:
policy_block2_text2: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, etc.
policy_block2_text3: Usage Data: Pages viewed, time spent on our site, clicks, and other behavioral data.
policy_block2_text4: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Information to enhance your experience.
policy_block3_text4: Send updates and promotional materials (with your consent).
policy_block4_text1: We do not sell your information. However, we may share your data:
policy_block4_text2: With service providers to perform tasks on our behalf.
policy_block4_text3: To comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.
policy_block4_text4: In the event of a business transaction (e.g., merger or sale).
policy_block5_text5: Opt-out of certain data uses (e.g., marketing).
policy_block5_text6: To exercise your rights, contact us at ''romanmarinec611@gmail.com''.
policy_block6_text1: We take your security seriously and use industry-standard measures to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
policy_block7_text1: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated 'Last Updated' date. Please review it periodically.
